entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -42.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 12:13 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -42.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -46.1°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 46. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
